comments:
wtp build: I20050623  Thu, 23 Jun 2005 -- 08:39 (-0400)

Repro:
1. File > New > Project > Web > J2EE Web Project.
2. Give the project a name, select a target server, click Finish.

Results: 
1. A project is created, but it is incomplete.
2. An error dialog appears with title "Wizard Error: New Dynamic Web Project"
and message "An error has occurred when New Dynamic Web Project finished." 
Clicking 'Details>>' yields the exception(s) below.

This also occurs when creating an EJB, Application Client, or Connector project.
Most J2EE functionality cannot be tested until this is fixed.
This has been fixed in today's IB (starting at 6pm EST)

Confirmed on IBuild 20060624 (0813).
Tested:
--confirmed the wizard completes without error for Web, EJB, Application Client,
Connector, and Enterprise Application.
--confirmed the structure for each created project appears complete.
